headline: Prudential Financial (PRU) Is Down 5.1% After Dividend Hike And Japan Sales Halt News - What's Changed
summary: Prudential Financial reported past fourth-quarter 2025 results showing net income of US$905 million versus a prior-year loss, alongside full-year net income of US$3.58 billion and a higher quarterly dividend of US$1.40 per share. At the same time, Prudential of Japan is halting new sales for 90 days to address employee misconduct and governance issues, putting more attention on how its international operations support the group’s long-term positioning. We’ll now examine how the mixed...
